website_summaries.verdict: One of the wider surfaces available on a watch face that creates a noticeable fashion statement.
pros: Spanning 38mm in diameter, this chicly-designed watch is adored by those who desire a stated, yet modernly designed accessory
Designed and developed in the USA, this watch is an easy favorite by the fashion forward
cons: Secures with a clasp, which is a detail not all customers will like

customer_reviews.title: Color conflict!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of my watch, but I wish I hadve gotten a different color! The first time I wore it, the color of my pants rubbed off on my watch and turned it blue. I guess this was from walking and brushing the band up against my leg. I'm sure it can be washed off with some leather cleaner, but it's annoying! Plus, after seeing my boyfriend's black MVMT watch, it made me wish I got that color even more. The black against the gold is beautiful! The quality of the watch is great, was packaged very nice, along with papers and a cute box.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: cool watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the large dial. Mostly I like that I can adjust the strap and it even came with the piece to do it. There are days that I like to wear it looser and It is easy to adjust. Very contemporary.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Sarvotham

customer_reviews.title: love the canvas band and rose gold
customer_reviews.text: The design is great! The glass face is pretty resilient. I have knocked it against plenty of things and not scratched it yet. The grey canvas band is the best part because it matches everything and is very low profile. Also, it's nice you can get the older version of the MVMT brand on Amazon - frustrating you cannot find them on MVMT, but the value is better here anyway.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted this watch since first seeing their commercials years ago. Great price on Prime day so I snapped it up. So far so good, keeps time well. Only a month of ownership and am very pleased with this watch. Band is a little long so I just loop it under the buckle. If any issues arise, I will add to review
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive watch, but clasp is a week-point in the design.
customer_reviews.text: The face is large and easy to read. The band is clean looking, but the catch/clasp is a little worrisome. I seems to lock (snap) together tightly, but if rubbed against the body or the like, it could easily become unclamped. I’ve had the watch fall off my arm twice in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley deJonge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality built to last
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas present for my fiancé and she absolutely loves this watch
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t clasp well
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this watch but the clasp won’t stay. I can’t wear a watch that is constantly coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonRankKC

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Advertising
customer_reviews.text: The online renders of the product look a lot higher quality than the real thing. I got the sunset and it should have a pearl reflective look, looking at it hard to differentiate from a flat white.
customer_reviews.author: Twaé-Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love it... but it’s unfair for the company to keep selling a faulty band
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of the watch... it has a big face but yet it’s elegant... not clunky. It looks expensive and will add a little something to any outfit. The only negative (which I read about before I purchased it) is that the band latch constantly comes undone and the watch will just fall off and get scratched or completely ruined. I can’t wear it until it’s fixed. But I like it enough to get it fixed rather than return it
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Pitty Pats opinion

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Elegant and Beautiful piece.. The best watch in my collection!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as birthday present from my husband. It got delivered 1 day in advance. It was delivered in perfect condition and I must say, it's exactly as I expected it to be. Classic elegant watch. Suites for both professional and casual look. It's muted rose gold wrist belt suites medium skin tone perfectly, without making it look too bright and shiny. Loved the minimalistic look and feel of it. If you are looking for a watch with subtle elegant look, go for it without a second thought! Model: Malibu Marble
customer_reviews.author: Y Sapna Senapaty

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my wife who's a nurse and needed a watch with a second hand. She loves it. Only wish I could a different style band that she would prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It got damaged after two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I wore it for two weeks and one of the bars fell off and got stuck over the top marking 12. Beautiful design, but the mesh is hard to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Florencia López

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me as a Christmas present and I absolutely love it! It’s more of a pink than a true “rose gold” but not too pink to where you can only wear it with certain colors. Looks great dressed up with some extra layered jewelry but also by itself as an every day, more causal watch. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Perfectly fashionable and functional being in nursing. The band is a perfect shade of blush and it’s not clunky at all!
customer_reviews.author: StephB

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased ‘Rose Gold’ it’s a bit yellow for my liking. Strap is a bit thicker than expected, also had some discoloring on the band. I would’ve exchanged, but I purchased on Prime Day & the company wouldn’t honor an even exchange for the sale price. I don’t think it’s worth the full amount ($125) so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: BNT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and modern look! Best part is that the strap is self adjusted sooooo you can tighten or loosen it yourself! You don’t need to spend money or go to the jewelers!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Minimal yet elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, lightweight watch. I thought not having any numbers on the face might bother me but it doesn’t. Turns out I do know how to tell time 🤪 The clasp is a little noisy at times and can be tricky to do but I’ll get used to it. I think it goes so nicely with the watch and is very comfortable. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: d7473

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in clasp hardware
customer_reviews.text: Loved the watchcase- the band & the adjustability of the band. However, it had to go back because the clasp, in my opinion was poor quality- I never felt it was actually secure. After practicing repeatedly I felt I couldn’t trust that it was actually closed.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love these watches
customer_reviews.text: This is the second MVMT watch I have bought and I am once again extremely satisfies with this purchase. These watches are so stylish and I get tons of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the new watch. It’s very classy and easy to read. The band was easy to take up for my small wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Goes With Everything
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this watch! I got the brown band, and it goes with almost everything. Can wear it casually or even with a more formal outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: GF loved this watch
customer_reviews.text: very very good product ,,,fast shipping, I would purchase this again
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute watch- I had a little trouble getting it to clasp, but my husband tinkered with it a little and it’s been fine ever since! Love it! Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: The Carpenters

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice large face. A little hard to read. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Foshee

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The band is a gross quality and stiff (Seems cheap) but the face is nice which elevates the watch. Overall not impressed though when I could have bought something like fossil for around the same price and get a nicer band.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful, classy looking watch. The watch face is big but not huge and it’s sleek. I’ve only worn it for a few hours and have already gotten a few compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful! And of course it works just as it should! Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jane A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Perfect Design, Perfect Experience
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch as it does everything I want with style! Packaging was well done too. I look forward to using this watch for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: brown not black
customer_reviews.text: sent back wasnr black but brown and took too long to receive
customer_reviews.author: melorie

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third movement watch. Perfect addition. Love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really nice. The clasp was a little tricky for me at first, but after a few tries I finally got the hang of it. Will definitely be purchasing some more MVMT watches in the future.
customer_reviews.author: sassg4

customer_reviews.title: Its Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it! The only thing is that you can’t really wear it 100% comfortably when you do physical labor.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but needs a mechanical upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Love the design however the clasp does not always stay locked and I do risk losing it from time to time as it’s come undone and if I or someone else doesn’t notice it slipping off or having already fallen to the ground I would be out the cash I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Shrum

customer_reviews.title: My wife won’t take it off.
customer_reviews.text: The watch was both easy to read and on my wife was beautiful. The watch was for my wife for part of her Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish watches
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different colors for my friends birthday and they look amazing, just like the photos! The leather bands need some time to give and mold to our wrists but other than that, they look great
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Great watch poor ordering experience
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in gold for my wife for Christmas but received one in rose gold. Thankfully my wife still liked it but I wish I had gotten what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive watch
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Love the rose gold & the color of the watch face. Easy to read the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch but band won't stay clipped
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Everything about it is gorgeous! But for the life of me I can't keep the band fastened, so I'm constantly pushing it back together to stay on. Just FYI. Otherwise, it's gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT LOOK!
customer_reviews.text: I love the classic look and the bigger dial. It can be worn anywhere with anything.
customer_reviews.author: LMA

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is a present so I do not know much more about this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Edward B. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing a smart watch for the past 2 years but wanted something more business casual for work. I absolutely love this watch and am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch it's classy.. it's great for casual dress and when you dress up. I love the big face on it.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, stylish, and simple to adjust! Love the look and happy it doesn’t add a lot of weight to my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Belco

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of watch! Love having second hand too!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: My watch goes with everything! I want it in more colors I’m obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Tania Paes

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This watch is high-quality at a great price. The grey color combined with rose gold is neutral and goes with (nearly) everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and style
customer_reviews.text: The watch is stylish, very thin and comfortable to wear. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: KJB

customer_reviews.title: Favorite watch!
customer_reviews.text: Movement watches are the ONLY watches I wear! I will never buy any other brand. These are the best. So pretty!
customer_reviews.author: maddie winchester

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When received the second hand was not attached and clasp did not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stanton

customer_reviews.title: A great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mroczek

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Greta watch!!! Lightweight. Love the band material. Goes with everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality,  not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The clockwise fell on the fourth day of using it
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: MVMT watches.
customer_reviews.text: There is no factory warranty when you purchase from a third party (amazon) according to MVMT. Terrible policy.
customer_reviews.author: John drager

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! The band is adjustable so it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Cay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful! Given to me for a graduation gift. I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: NAVSPYCAV

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Look
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, it's sleek and slim and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch, it was a gift and he was not disappointed! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Kat Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: would recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.text: i was very satisfied with watch, i bought it for my wife and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

product_meta.title: MVMT Women's Minimalist Vintage Watch
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :6.8 x 3.5 x 1.7 inches; 1.44 Ounces
 * Item model number :Boulevard
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required.
 * Date First Available :May 15, 2018
 * Manufacturer :MVMT
 * ASIN :B073QZYQJQ

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #104,838 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #788 inMen's Watches 
    *  #315 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #26930 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars168 ratings
feature_bullets: MVMT Boulevard minimalist watches feature a California-chic design with a 38 MM diameter, 6 MM thick case; movement is battery-powered 3-hand Miyota Quartz
This "Beverly" style has a strap in grey genuine leather with interchangeable capabilities; rose gold hands and markers complement a white dial
The rose gold case is made from brushed rose gold stainless steel, and hardened mineral crystal provides the glass with durability; perfect for your adventures
Elegant and durable, this watch has water resistance up to 3 ATM/30 Meters; the Boulevard is great for everyday use, but it should not be submerged in water
The Boulevard watch was designed in Los Angeles, CA; we're confident that you'll love this product, so we offer a two-year guarantee
